body_html: Thanks @lightcatcher for the suggestion. @danmane, please take a look at this issue. If it is something we will not do in the short-term maybe mark it contributions welcome. If it is something you are planning to include in your plugin API anyways, please close the issue to keep the backlog clear.

body: Thanks @lightcatcher for the suggestion. @danmane, please take a look at this issue. If it is something we will not do in the short-term maybe mark it contributions welcome. If it is something you are planning to include in your plugin API anyways, please close the issue to keep the backlog clear.
